title: Sundays Beach Club Afternoon (Half-day)
overview: Enjoy a private white sand beach, water sports, and beachfront dining at Sundays Beach Club.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy water sports, sunbathing, and swimming.
Experience the daily beach bonfire at sunset.

title: Sundays Beach Club Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of beach fun, water sports, and relaxation at Sundays Beach Club, including bonfires and great food.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy water sports, sunbathing, and swimming.
Participate in water sports, relax by the beach, or enjoy the club facilities.
Experience the daily beach bonfire at sunset.
